name: Rollio
description: Enhance your browser with Rollio. Give back hours of time to sales & service, and start capturing missing & accurate CRM data.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; frame-src http://localhost:8080/ https://ng-app-chrome-development.rollio.ai/ https://ng-app-chrome-staging.rollio.ai/ https://ng-app-chrome.rollio.ai/
content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; object-src 'self'
